ygData.subject: Re: around the world
ygData.msgSnippet: Mustex comfortably sits at the controls. The others had reported that the ship seemed difficult to control, almost wild, but it is so easy to him. Several

 Mustex comfortably sits at the controls. The others had reported 
that the
ship seemed difficult to control, almost wild, but it is so easy to 
him.
Several times it almost seemed that the ship read his mind. Soon they 
will
have to stop at India. It seems almost sad that at full power this 
ship
could destroy the Ark like it was nothing,but it couldn't now even 
fly around
the world at 200 mph or 1 billionth of its maximum speed(no current 
living
being could survive its maximum speed although I may later try to 
negociate
wormholes).
 Suddenly he is in a darkness.
Voice:Master...master...master...
 Mustex approaches a strange purple creature.
Mustex:Who are you?
Creature:I am Carnitron...Master.
 Carnitron bows down to Mustex.
Mustex:Ca-Car-Carnitron.
Creature:Yes that is what you christened me. If you don't like it I 
am yours
to change.
Mustex:So you're the ship?
Carnitron:Yes,but its not important. I am here to give you a present.
 He raises his hand and sparks fly at Mustex. Suddenly he is awake. 
Stallex
and Rhesus are there. Still,it is different. There are now strings 
connecting
both objects and ideas to each other. He can even vaguely glimpse the
universes core which was both everywhere and nowhere.
Mustex:What happened?
Stallex:Some kind of power surge. You look like a partial transmetal 
now. The
ship's behaving better maybe you taught it some manners.
 He had. Now that they had talked the ship knew who it could trust.
Mustex:Let me have a mirror.
 He isn't a part transmetal he saw. That would have effected both some
organics and some robotics,this change effected only his Robotics. He 
knows
what he is. He is a part Rocak.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Mustex holds a bottle of liquid energon high above his head.
> Mustex:And so I Christen thee the "Carnitron".
>  He smashes it into the ships side. It burns his hand,but he 
ignores 
> it. Then
> suddenly sparks jump out of the side and cause his hand to glow. 
Once 
> again
> he ignores it.
> Stallex:Why "Car...
> Mustex:Don't go there.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex,Stallex,and Rhesus walk along the Sahara(don't ask where 
> their
> > hover-cycles are)when suddenly the ground caved in under them. 
When 
> > they
> > stood up they were surprised to see a small spaceship.
> > Mustex:I thin-thin-think it mig-might be Ear-Early Ro-Rocak. Not 
> the 
> > late
> > mind you,but still a 300 year technological quantum leap ahead of 
> us.
> >  They walk inside and examine it.
> > Mustex:The good news is this ship could fly the 3 of us to 
> Cybertron 
> > for
> > Maximal reinforcements. The bad news is the powercells are shot. 
> The 
> > bonus
> > good news is that with this technology we can tap tousands of 
> energy 
> > sources
> > on this planet. The bonus bad news is that the only one that will 
> > suffice in
> > less than 500 years is to drain it from animals,proto-humans,and 
> > other bots
> > and that's just cruel.
> > Stallex:If we want to be the best we have to make sacrifices.
> > Mustex:True.
> >  Mustex begins partially charging the ship woth some of his own 
> > energy.
> > Stallex:Just be careful not to drain to much.
> > Mustex:Just enough to pick up our wrecked hover-cycles(OHHH!),and 
> > maybe get a
> > lttle more power out of them.
